statements: DELETE FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 123 AND country = 'USA';
DELETE FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30 AND (country = 'Canada' OR country = 'Australia');
DELETE FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 123 AND email = 'john.doe@example.com'
DELETE FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 456 AND preference_name = 'dark_mode'
DELETE FROM SupportTickets WHERE user_id = 500 AND status = 'open';
DELETE FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username = 'john.doe') AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
